column4: Hmm... ch0wda - I've been having issues too... i'm starting to suspect the repos (dabaR and EvilDennisR may also read this)
Mine has been downloading, but everything seems totally wrong
I'm giving up on Ubuntu for now... three days trying to run a simple update is stupidly bad
Everything to do with apt and dpkg seems to give the same errors... ive just had enough now
A fresh install doesnt even fix the issues... something is broke and its not these computers... its got to be the repos or the link between them and me
Will there be an updated Hardy disc at some point with all the updates preinstalled?
which Firefox do you want to run?
- Firefox isnt the issue, its all the updates... i cannot perform updates after a fresh install on any machine... i dont know why
well you could run the latest Windows version of Firefox, but that's a bit stupid
make sure proposed updates is on in the package maanger
but that's not a very helfpul answer and so
you probably connect on Windows with some sort of AOL software yes?
- Nope, the Windows machines have never touched an AOL CD and work fine
